# [Interview #403: AOL Chat 2, Entry #48](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=403#48)

#### Question

Why was Perrin not in
*The Fires of Heaven*
?

#### Robert Jordan

He had a lot of things to do back home, and they were all pretty boring.
